item.title: 实时监控
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/advantage/monitor/ Live Monitor 实时监控 We discussed the toolbox module before. It will listen on 127.0.0.1:8088 by default when the application is running. It

item.title: 自动 API 文档
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/advantage/docs/ Automated API Documentation 自动 API 文档 Automated documentation is a very cool feature that I found to be desirable. Now it became a reality in Beego.
